A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
This is what William Shatner (Captain Kirk from Star Trek) posted on 4chan about The Last Jedi.

"It's me Shatner. I just wanted to say hi\, and tell you guys the last jedi indeed was bad. We have had this banter rivalry with Star Wars for ages\, but this was the first time I saw Mark truly depressed about what they did with luke. 
If they took Kirk\, made him a crying coward who sells out his best friends and dies for nothing at all\, I suppose I would be mad too."
- William Shatner
